name: Liberty Reserve Payment WPPlugin
author: papadestra

sections.description:
Simple to make payments using Liberty Reserve (Your customers to send any amount / Currency USD).

For information and questions please:

sections.installation:
1. Upload Directory liberty-reserve-payment-wpplugin to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory

  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

  3. input the shortcode [libertyreserve] on your page and Publish !!

PERFECT!
